about.intro: From writing my first line of code in middle school to building complex web applications, my journey in tech has been driven by curiosity and innovation. I thrive on turning challenges into elegant solutions and staying at the forefront of web development technologies.

webdev.title: Professional Web Development
webdev.description: Mastered full-stack development at OpenClassrooms, specializing in modern web technologies and agile methodologies. Created multiple production-ready applications, from concept to deployment.
